definitions.a2: interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer; Eh?; what?;
definitions.a3: interjection of surprise or doubt; Eh?; My!; what's up?;
definitions.a4: interjection or grunt of agreement; uhm; Ah, OK; expression of recognition; Oh, it's you!;
definitions.a5: modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent;
